definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: So the chemo finished. Then, blood began to appear in the patient's urine.
sentences.chinese: 后来，化疗结束以后，病人出现了血尿。

sentences.english: For me, reading about chemo brain has resurrected that faint taste of metal.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，读到化疗脑使我重新想起了金属味。

sentences.english: Radiotherapy and chemotherapy can damage the fertility and ovarian function heavily.
sentences.chinese: 放化疗严重损害患者的卵巢功能和生育能力。

sentences.english: Kangai Baojin Decoction had proved to be the role of reliving toxicity and adding efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 证明抗癌保金方在肺癌化疗中确有减毒增效的作用。

sentences.english: So far, there has been no resistance to antileprosy treatment when used as MDT.
sentences.chinese: 迄今，对使用联合化疗的抗麻风治疗无抗药性。

sentences.english: These observations suggest that bleomycin A_6 may be useful in human liver cancer chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果提示博来霉素A_6有可能用于肝癌化疗。

sentences.english: Patients who are candidates for induction chemotherapy should be treated with TPF.
sentences.chinese: 诱导化疗适宜患者应采用TPF方案治疗。

sentences.english: Tumor, as a whole, has multicellular drug resistance ( or multicelluar-meditated resistance ).
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤组织，作为一个整体，常对化疗产生耐药。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT Choriocarcinoma is one of solid tumors which are sensitive to chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛膜癌是一种对化疗敏感的实体肿瘤。

sentences.english: Radiation in the mouth is one of the most brutal of cancer treatments.
sentences.chinese: 口腔化疗是最让人难以忍受的癌症治疗手段之一。

sentences.english: Objective To research the synergism and attenuation of insulin on chemotherapy of malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胰岛素对恶性肿瘤化疗的增效减毒作用。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the treatment effects of smear-positive cases with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析涂阳肺结核病人的化疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the antitumor effect of gemcitabine in chemotherapy with breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨吉西他滨在乳腺癌化疗中的作用。

sentences.english: Dietary fiber also can facilitate intestinal recovery after enterocolitis induced by chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 膳食纤维还有利于化疗引起的肠道炎症恢复。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of neoadjuvant chemotherapy on advanced breast cancer .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨新辅助化疗在晚期乳腺癌治疗中的效果。

sentences.english: Extravasation of antineoplastic agents is one of the most common complications of chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 抗肿瘤药外渗是化疗过程中的常见并发症之一。

definition: to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
